metadata.title: CVE-2021-30164 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: Redmine before 4.0.8 and 4.1.x before 4.1.2 allows attackers to bypass theadd_issue_notes permission requirement by leveraging the Issues API.

criterions.comment: redmine: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
